title: Radost FX Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Italian, Beer/Wine, Catering, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Brunch menu also has smoked salmon, so is not all vegetarian. Large gallery divided into a music night club, day bar, music shop, lounge and vegetarian restaurant (vegtarianska restaurace). Extensive veggie food menu is also in English and features choices including soup, salad, pizza, pasta, sandwiches, Asian dishes, Mexican food, and more. Most dishes contain dairy and/or eggs. Regular menu has only a couple vegan dishes, clearly marked. Weekend brunch menu, served until 3pm, is American style with waffles, french toast, and has a few vegan plates. Also an extensive alcohol menu. Full menu from 10.30-5pm and 7pm-12am. Light food menu Thur-Sat from 12am-4am when the night club is open on those nights. Smoking is permitted except prohibited from 11am-3pm. Directions: IP Pavlova subway stop. Or short walk from St. Wencenslas statue facing the Museum, go right and then left to the backside of the Museum.
